body:
Well, I've had a good run on Avicus, but I am leaving now.
I've noticed that I spend WAY too much time on Minecraft, when I could be doing other things (more soccer, skiing in the winter, and so on...).
For that reason, I am leaving both Avicus and Minecraft, probably forever.

If you guys are wondering what I'm going to do with my YouTube channel, here's what's going to happen:
No, I'm not going to end my channel. A lot of people were asking me on YouTube and on Skype, but I've decided that I really don't want to end it.
I'm not going to be doing any more Minecraft videos (Except for 1 Nebula video which I haven't uploaded yet), so instead, I'm going to play some other games. Some of those games include:
-Mount & Blade: Warband
-Fifa 14
I don't have many in mind right now, but if you have a request, feel free to tell me.

I will still be forum active (probably not as much), and might hop onto TS every once in a while. I would give my Emerald rank away, but it's not allowed.
Also, since I know I won't apply for moderator anymore, I might start doing prank calls again. The only reason why I haven't done any prank calls for a while is because they showed I was "immature", and for that reason my application was denied last time.

Last of all, I just want to thank a bunch of you guys for being terrific people to hang out with, and being my friends on Avicus :

CrafterPete1013
99250
jojobloblo
EricV4
TheRomanTrident
TheHoopsMan
WestbyBaller
MiguelPlayz
X_heat
cinammoncroc000
Jake41901
Merlinmaster
TarheelKiwi
UltraBubbles618
Zedther
Arachadonic
corkscrew102
yoshicole365
DaBaderMC
vsplesk101
OPTOBAT
iBiZa_MiNeCrAfT

There are many more of you guys, and I could add dozens to this list.
Well, I'll talk to you guys on the forums / TS / YouTube, bye! :c

Bai Porky I cri :'(

Maybe come back some time bae <3

P.S Thx 4 including me in ze list <3
